sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"> <sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <includes/> <macroponent display_value="Record Page(task)">5e177aeb4513211081c556046c3b6d52</macroponent> <name>record_header_1/headerImageItem</name> <preset/> <required_translations/> <script><![CDATA[/** * @param {params} params * @param {api} params.api * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers */ function evaluateProperty({ api, helpers }) { if (api.context.props.table == 'sc_req_item') { return { headerImage: api.data.look_up_record_2.result.picture.displayValue, fieldLabel: "Test value" //Here only to support the required structure of the object } } else { return ""; } }]]></script> <script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version> <sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-06-14 11:48:12</sys_created_on> <sys_id>d6177aeb98132110dd5ddee5cc549440</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>record_header_1/headerImageItem</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Flow Finder" source="x_350851_flow_fi_0">18d672eb97132110974bbf1e6253afc8</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Flow Finder">18d672eb97132110974bbf1e6253afc8</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_d6177aeb98132110dd5ddee5cc549440</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-06-14 11:48:12</sys_updated_on> <target>macroponent</target> <type>transform</type> </sys_ux_client_script> </record_update>
